review: I was on sulfasalazine for 25 years until my kidney function decreased, and I had bone marrow suppression. In other words, I became pretty ill. I already had third stage kidney disease from another medication, bipolar. I take Topamax for the migraines.I have gastroparesis and take 5 other medications. I originally started with acute crohn's olitis but have been in remission since taking prednisone & then sulfasalazine
